TopicTitle: Cant play save the world in fortnite

Articles.Content:
Sorry if it's in the wrong forum, but Fortnite says save the world is free in 2018.

 

It's 5 months in 2018, and it isnt free. So basically i found a glitch.

19 hours ago, Mudkip909 said:

It's 5 months in 2018, and it isnt free.

2018 is just a year. An event that takes place in a specific year doesn't have to go through an entire year, from January 1st to December 31st. If there is no specific date specified that means it can happend anytime this year. even if it becomes free on December 31st at 11:59PM, that still means it will be available for free this year.

19 hours ago, Mudkip909 said:

So basically i found a glitch.

A glitch is a sudden, usually temporary malfunction in or fault of equipment, according to google. I don't think something not happending during a period of time you expect it to be is a glitch.

I think you just have to wait, i read a few articles that state the 'Save the World' will be available for free in a few months.

https://www.dailystar.co.uk/tech/gaming/705581/Fortnite-Save-the-World-FREE-codes-Epic-Games-good-news-release-date-Battle-Royale-Switch

http://www.playstationlifestyle.net/2018/05/28/fortnite-save-the-world-free-codes/

https://www.express.co.uk/entertainment/gaming/965848/Fortnite-Save-the-World-free-codes

Just be patient.
